title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set, but expression builder displays old column names when selecting the dataset.
description: Setting alias for columns in a dataset does not reflect accurately in the expression builder.
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the alias set for columns is not displayed; instead, the old column names are shown.
EB: The expression builder should display the aliases assigned to columns when selecting the dataset.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
